definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Spaghetti with kaffir be placed in rooms directly to the air-conditioned living room.
sentences.chinese: 大盆君子蘭可放置在廳堂，直接用來調節客廳的空氣。
則是君子蘭一個“君子”的寫照。

sentences.english: Clivia you finally lose past love, revealing a gentleman's demeanor.
sentences.chinese: 君子蘭你終於不失往日之情，透出君子之風範。

sentences.english: He has a largish clivia nursery and very abundant types of clivias .
sentences.chinese: 他有一個非常大的君子蘭園和非常豐富的品種。

definition: lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom)/fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows
pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1

definition: to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
everything in the garden is lovely
Garden of Many Flowers (name)/Baihua garden in Hongmiao village 洪廟村|洪庙村[Hong2 miao4 cun1], Shandong
